sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts and the Rope Tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Upper Trails will be groomed later today. We are clearing brush from the wind yesterday.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a great day to be on skis. The heavy wet snow from yesterday has dried out and the groomed surface is in great shape. We still have excellent coverage on the majority of our terrain. Sunshine and warmth are forecast as the day progresses and should bring spring snow conditions this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
